00051 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(class) btHingeConstraint : public btTypedConstraint

00175         // extra motor API, including ability to set a target rotation (as opposed to angular velocity)
00176         // note: setMotorTarget sets angular velocity under the hood, so you must call it every tick to
00177         //       maintain a given angular target.
00178         void enableMotor(bool enableMotor)      { m_enableAngularMotor = enableMotor; }
00179         void setMaxMotorImpulse(btScalar maxMotorImpulse) { m_maxMotorImpulse = maxMotorImpulse; }
00180         void setMotorTargetVelocity(btScalar motorTargetVelocity) { m_motorTargetVelocity = motorTargetVelocity; }

00182         void setMotorTarget(btScalar targetAngle, btScalar dt);

00185         void    setLimit(btScalar low,btScalar high,btScalar _softness = 0.9f, btScalar _biasFactor = 0.3f, btScalar _relaxationFactor = 1.0f)
00186         {
00187 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00188                 m_limit.set(low, high, _softness, _biasFactor, _relaxationFactor);
00189 #else
00190                 m_lowerLimit = btNormalizeAngle(low);
00191                 m_upperLimit = btNormalizeAngle(high);
00192                 m_limitSoftness =  _softness;
00193                 m_biasFactor = _biasFactor;
00194                 m_relaxationFactor = _relaxationFactor;
00195 #endif
00196         }
00197         
00198         btScalar getLimitSoftness() const
00199         {
00200 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00201                 return m_limit.getSoftness();
00202 #else
00203                 return m_limitSoftness;
00204 #endif
00205         }
00206 
00207         btScalar getLimitBiasFactor() const
00208         {
00209 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00210                 return m_limit.getBiasFactor();
00211 #else
00212                 return m_biasFactor;
00213 #endif
00214         }
00215 
00216         btScalar getLimitRelaxationFactor() const
00217         {
00218 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_

00220 #else
00221                 return m_relaxationFactor;
00222 #endif
00223         }
00224 
00225         void    setAxis(btVector3& axisInA)
00226         {
00227                 btVector3 rbAxisA1, rbAxisA2;
00228                 btPlaneSpace1(axisInA, rbAxisA1, rbAxisA2);
00229                 btVector3 pivotInA = m_rbAFrame.getOrigin();
00230 //              m_rbAFrame.getOrigin() = pivotInA;
00231                 m_rbAFrame.getBasis().setValue( rbAxisA1.getX(),rbAxisA2.getX(),axisInA.getX(),
00232                                                                                 rbAxisA1.getY(),rbAxisA2.getY(),axisInA.getY(),
00233                                                                                 rbAxisA1.getZ(),rbAxisA2.getZ(),axisInA.getZ() );
00234 
00235                 btVector3 axisInB = m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis() * axisInA;
00236 
00237                 btQuaternion rotationArc = shortestArcQuat(axisInA,axisInB);
00238                 btVector3 rbAxisB1 =  quatRotate(rotationArc,rbAxisA1);
00239                 btVector3 rbAxisB2 = axisInB.cross(rbAxisB1);
00240 
00241                 m_rbBFrame.getOrigin() = m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform().inverse()(m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform()(pivotInA));
00242 
00243                 m_rbBFrame.getBasis().setValue( rbAxisB1.getX(),rbAxisB2.getX(),axisInB.getX(),
00244                                                                                 rbAxisB1.getY(),rbAxisB2.getY(),axisInB.getY(),
00245                                                                                 rbAxisB1.getZ(),rbAxisB2.getZ(),axisInB.getZ() );
00246                 m_rbBFrame.getBasis() = m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform().getBasis().inverse() * m_rbBFrame.getBasis();
00247 
00248         }
00249 
00250     bool hasLimit() const {
00251 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00252         return m_limit.getHalfRange() > 0;
00253 #else
00254         return m_lowerLimit <= m_upperLimit;
00255 #endif
00256     }
00257 
00258         btScalar        getLowerLimit() const
00259         {
00260 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00261         return m_limit.getLow();
00262 #else
00263         return m_lowerLimit;
00264 #endif
00265         }
00266 
00267         btScalar        getUpperLimit() const
00268         {
00269 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00270         return m_limit.getHigh();
00271 #else           
00272         return m_upperLimit;
00273 #endif
00274         }

00459 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       int     btHingeConstraint::calculateSerializeBufferSize() const
00460 {
00461         return sizeof(btHingeConstraintData);
00462 }
00463 
00465 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       const char*     btHingeConstraint::serialize(void* dataBuffer, btSerializer* serializer) const
00466 {
00467         btHingeConstraintData* hingeData = (btHingeConstraintData*)dataBuffer;
00468         btTypedConstraint::serialize(&hingeData->m_typeConstraintData,serializer);
00469 
00470         m_rbAFrame.serialize(hingeData->m_rbAFrame);
00471         m_rbBFrame.serialize(hingeData->m_rbBFrame);
00472 
00473         hingeData->m_angularOnly = m_angularOnly;
00474         hingeData->m_enableAngularMotor = m_enableAngularMotor;
00475         hingeData->m_maxMotorImpulse = float(m_maxMotorImpulse);
00476         hingeData->m_motorTargetVelocity = float(m_motorTargetVelocity);
00477         hingeData->m_useReferenceFrameA = m_useReferenceFrameA;
00478 #ifdef  _BT_USE_CENTER_LIMIT_
00479         hingeData->m_lowerLimit = float(m_limit.getLow());
00480         hingeData->m_upperLimit = float(m_limit.getHigh());
00481         hingeData->m_limitSoftness = float(m_limit.getSoftness());
00482         hingeData->m_biasFactor = float(m_limit.getBiasFactor());
00483         hingeData->m_relaxationFactor = float(m_limit.getRelaxationFactor());
00484 #else
00485         hingeData->m_lowerLimit = float(m_lowerLimit);
00486         hingeData->m_upperLimit = float(m_upperLimit);
00487         hingeData->m_limitSoftness = float(m_limitSoftness);
00488         hingeData->m_biasFactor = float(m_biasFactor);
00489         hingeData->m_relaxationFactor = float(m_relaxationFactor);
00490 #endif
00491 
00492         // Fill padding with zeros to appease msan.
00493 #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00494         hingeData->m_padding1[0] = 0;
00495         hingeData->m_padding1[1] = 0;
00496         hingeData->m_padding1[2] = 0;
00497         hingeData->m_padding1[3] = 0;
00498 #endif
00499 
00500         return btHingeConstraintDataName;
00501 }
